education.degree: Degree in Bachelor of Science (Computer Science)
education.track: Artificial Intelligence and Cybersecurity with a Second Major in Business Analytics

machine_learning.title: Machine Learning Engineer (Internship)
responsibilities: Led development of an on-premise large language model (LLM) AI assistant, ensuring 100% data privacy compliance.
Leveraged Langchain library to implement advanced retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) techniques, resulting in a 25% improvement in response accuracy across 10,000+ test queries.
Optimized RAG performance by integrating Map Reduce, Stuffing, and Reranking methods, achieving a 30% increase in relevant document retrieval and a 15% boost in answer generation quality.
Engineered an agent-based system using Langchain that dynamically selects optimal RAG techniques, improving adaptability by 35% and reducing irrelevant responses by 50% in diverse query scenarios.

software_engineering.title: Software Engineer (Internship)
responsibilities: Spearheaded the comprehensive upgrade of the company’s Storybook application, transitioning it seamlessly from version 6.0 to 7.0 and concurrently migrating from Vue 2.0 to 3.0.
Orchestrated the refactoring and optimization of the Storybook codebase, achieving a remarkable 30% reduction in code volume.
Innovatively implemented a searchable table of i18n translation phrases, streamlining the process for developers to locate the precise strings for their UI components.

Thoroughly documented over 100 UI components in Storybook, providing developers with essential code snippets, prop descriptions, and visual examples as valuable references, ensuring seamless integration with the upgraded versions.

machine_learning.name: ResumeGPT
details: Developed ResumeGPT, a dynamic resume writer designed to tailor resumes based on specific job applications, increasing the likelihood of passing initial screening stages.
Leveraged LangChain and OpenAI GPT, integrating advanced natural language processing to generate highly customized resumes that align with job requirements.
Implemented advanced customization algorithms, which improved application success rates by targeting keywords and skills directly relevant to job postings.
Optimized resume generation processes, resulting in a 40% increase in the rate of resumes passing initial automated screenings compared to generic resume formats.

machine_learning.name: Image Caption Generator
details: Developed machine learning models utilizing open-source architectures like VGG16 and Keras Library and training code to automate image caption generation, scoring 0.54 on BLEU metric for caption quality evaluation.
Preprocessed image datasets and text corpuses to prepare data for model training, increasing data efficiency by 15%.
Trained deep learning models including CNN encoder and LSTM decoder architectures to generate descriptive captions.

Developed a movie recommendation system in Python to suggest movies to users based on similarity of movie genres and synopses, delivering top 5 recommended movies with 75% precision based on user preferences.

software_engineering.name: Green Habor
details: Developed Green Harbor to connect users with food rescue opportunities and skill-building workshops, using Flask for backend services and RabbitMQ for message brokering, and Kubernetes for container orchestration.
Leveraged AWS services including Amazon RDS, Lambda, Cognito, DynamoDB, and Elasticsearch to create a scalable, secure, and efficient platform.
Implemented real-time notifications to alert users about new food rescue items, enhancing user engagement and reducing food waste.
Facilitated Freegan workshops on skills like object repair and food cultivation, empowering users with practical knowledge and resources.

software_engineering.name: Smart Inventory
details: Designed and engineered a responsive web application for household food inventory tracking using Spring Boot and React.js.
Developed SQL database and implemented CRUD operations to enable users to add, update, and delete food items and view expiry information.
Created an intuitive dashboard interface visualizing food stock levels and expiry timelines to optimize grocery planning.

certifications.name: Oracle Certified Foundations Associate, Java
certifications.description: Earned Oracle Certified Foundations Associate, Java certification validating core knowledge of Java programming including syntax, OOP concepts, exceptions, Strings, arrays, loops, and object handling.
